snippet.title: Some Distant Memory Announcement - Out on November 14th!
snippet.description:
Find out more at http://www.somedistantmemory.com.

Some Distant Memory, by Way Down Deep and Galvanic Games, is a story-heavy exploration game coming out in 2019 for PC, Mac, and Nintendo Switch.

Hundreds of years after the collapse of civilization, you are the Professor, an archaeologist searching for the sunken city of Houston.  Helping you are the Commander, an explorer from another colony, and ARORA, an artificial intelligence built to help the survivors of the Collapse.

You can find out more at www.somedistantmemory.com.
